title: Welcome To Our Icecream Cart
text: Currently we have an amazing offer for you .

title: Cherry Amaretto.
text:
We combine the unmatched flavor of black cherry,
              with the sweetness of almond in the Amaretto.
              This delightful treat is a big hit and we are sure you’ll like it!.

title: Chocolate Icecream
text:
Enjoy that old fashioned ice cream parlor
              taste with classic gourmet chocolate ice cream.
              The perfect blend of rich cocoa makes it #1 choice for chocolate lovers.

title: Butter Brickle
text:
The warm flavor of the butter brickle pieces highlights
              the creaminess of this gourmet ice cream.
              The caramel color promises a taste experience that is well lived up to.

title: French Vanilla
text:
Our richest, most indulgent Vanilla inspired by the
              traditional French custard. Perfectly pairs with Parfaits, Pancakes & Waffles.
              we have introduced this flavor of our own experiment
